name: dilate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to (cause a part of the body to) become wider or further open: The pupils of the eyes dilate as darkness increases. This drug will dilate the arteries.

Phrasal verb
dilate on/upon something
Add to word list
Add to word list
to become or make something, esp. an opening, wider or more open: [ T ] The doctor put drops in my eyes to dilate the pupils.
